raw_data.title: Feel the News w Marcela Onyango
raw_data.description: Feel the Newsis a variety comedy show that also tells you how to feel about the news. After wowing zoomers all over on TikTok by giving them news with a sense of humour and anarchy, hostMarcela Onyangodecided to bring their strong feelings about the news IRL. During this very fun comedy variety hour, Marcela will humorously tell you how to feel about the news from an anarchist perspective while very funny comedians keep you laughing. In addition to very funny comedians, every month's show raises funds for direct action projects like mutual aid for people seeking asylum. So come laugh and support your community. You will leave the show more radical and more empowered, I promise.July’s lineup includesAlexandria LoveAtheer YacoubWinterLaura MerliWill PurpuraChristina BrownALL SALES FINALTickets

raw_data.title: Boogie Blind Presents: Easily feat. Sticky Dojah
raw_data.description: Slide through Friday night , July 11th, and get right with top tier party starter and Uptown representative,DJ Boogie Blind, alongside special guestSticky Dojahfor “Easily”, a club night connecting nostalgic and new eras of the sounds that shaped the Big Apple whether it's Hip-Hop, Dancehall, Soul, or R&B.Pull up to Friends and Lovers and cut up for a night to remember at “Easily” with special guests alongside resident Boogie Blind from 10PM to 4AM every second Friday of the month.$10 general admission*$5 before 11PM w/ proof of RSVP*= No RequestsAll Sales FinalRSVPPhil Lembke, akaSticky Dojah, originally from Germany, is a DJ based in New York City. With over two decades of record-digging and Hip Hop as his foundation, his sets seamlessly blend a wide range of styles—from Soul, House, and Disco to Grooves and sounds from around the globe.His online mix videos have garnered millions of views on social media, inspiring vinyl enthusiasts from beginners to seasoned industry veterans. Known for his expertise with 7-inch vinyl, Sticky Dojah is one of the curators of “Touch of Classics,” a weekly all-vinyl event at the Darling Rooftop, and co-hosts the radio showRecords Before Renton Brooklyn’s iconic Lot Radio. Whether spinning all-vinyl sets or electronic club music, he delivers timeless classics while unearthing rare and unknown gems to energize any party with his funky, eclectic selections.Before moving to the U.S., Sticky Dojah played extensively across Europe and toured in Russia and Africa. He has shared stages with and performed for renowned artists such as Nils Frahm, Sergio Mendes, Q-Tip, Redman & Method Man, Nightmares on Wax, A Guy Called Gerald, Schoolly D, and more.A Red Bull Music Academy alumnus, Sticky Dojah has collaborated with global brands and institutions, including Google, Adidas, Universal, MoMA, the Goethe-Institut, Coca-Cola, Soho House, Institut Français, Edit 1, Nivea, and Diesel, among others.DJ Boogie Blind, is one of the most trusted and respected DJs in the industry today. As a Harlem representative, World Champion, and member of the pioneering X-Ecutioners DJ crew Boogie Blind has consistently served up NY’s true sound internationally for over two decades. Whether he’s rocking crowds for Coachella, NBA All Star Weekend, Montreux Jazz Fest, or the Espy Awards, Blind is always pushing the envelope in the booth with timeless Hip-hop, Funk, Dancehall, Disco, and House of yesterday and today.

raw_data.title: Discount Philosophy (Live Comedy)
raw_data.description: Part thought-provoking, part foolish: Discount Philosophy gathers some of the brightest minds in comedy to discuss life's most pressing ideas—one joke at a time.What is the meaning of life? Are we alone in the universe? What's for dinner? Join host,Spencer Simpson, and a variety of talented comedians as they interrogate questions that have plagued humanity for ages. A comedy show where great humor is matched with great inquiry: Discount Philosophy asks you to come for the laughs but stay for the confusion. Or the drinks.Saturday’s lineup includesShaunak GodkhindiGeorge HaywardWhitney RobinsonTICKETS

raw_data.title: Annie Hildebrand and Friends (Live Comedy)
raw_data.description: Watch local standout comedians do their best set at the pleasure of oneAnnie Hildebrand, comedy czar of the evening. After each set, she'll give a thumbs up or thumbs down, gladiator style, to determine if that comedian is allowed to continue their comedy career, or if they must quit forever. In the middle of the show, these stakes are then passed over to the audience where those who choose to participate are thrown into the pop culture gauntlet, competing in a round of trivia. Winners get prizes and losers must quit trivia for the rest of their lives.June’s lineup includesBrittany CarneyAnna BiancoPatrick HastieDan TreadwayArielle DundasHosted By:Annie HildebrandTICKETS

raw_data.title: Awkward Sex...And The City
raw_data.description: Awkward Sex is exactly what it sounds like: comedians reliving intimate tales about their sex life and breaking barriers about sex and dating.Hosted by Natalie Wall, the show pairs sexual inclusion with humor and sheds light on the awkward universal experience we all know and love.Awkward Sex is about taking taboo subjects and creating a safe space for people to feel seen and heard.From cocaine infused one night stands to IBS flare ups during cunnilingus, you and your friends will be hanging on to every word and excited to go out and have a sexual misadventure of your own.“Good sex is always good sex, but it takes a special person to turn bad sex into something amazing. And that’s where our New York comedian and podcaster Natalie Wall comes in.” -Philadelphia Gay News“The voyeur within will delight.” – Refinery29TICKETS

raw_data.title: NQOMA
raw_data.description: NQOMA is a party series by Umumaroon that celebrates the African & diasporic drum cultures moving dance music worldwide. From amapiano to batida, baile funk to GQOM, afrobeats to jersey club and more, NQOMA is guaranteed to shake the dancefloor and move bodies featuring some the city's finest selectas.

raw_data.title: Ricardo Grilli Trio
raw_data.description: Experience an unforgettable evening at Friends and Lovers in Brooklyn as the Ricardo Grilli Trio brings their electrifying fusion of modern jazz, rock, funk, and Brazilian rhythms to the stage. Led by guitarist Ricardo Grilli, a rising star in the jazz scene who has graced iconic venues such as Smalls Jazz Club, The Blue Note, and the 55 Bar, the trio delivers a dynamic performance that blends virtuosic improvisation with infectious grooves. Drawing inspiration from luminaries like John Scofield and Eric Krasno, Grilli's compositions and arrangements showcase his unique voice as a composer and guitarist. With a rich musical background that includes performances with artists like Chris Potter, Aaron Parks, and Joe Martin, this is a night of music you won't want to miss.TICKETS

raw_data.title: Ben Pagano + Nico Fox + Fury Young (Live)
raw_data.description: Join us at Friends and Lovers for an eclectic evening of soulful and ethereal music featuring local NYC songwritersBen Pagano,Nico Fox, andFury Young.Ben Pagano is a local singer-songwriter, pianist and actor. His music is a blend of jazz, pop, soul, funk and psychedelia whilst maintaining a cohesiveness that defines the sound. His work is critically acclaimed and has been covered in publications such as New Yorker Magazine, Deli Magazine, Impose, Tiny Mixtapes to name some. He is currently working on his fourth album which will be released later this year.listen -benpagano.bandcamp.comBrooklyn-based artist Nico Fox, known professionally as Real Clothes, blends melancholy Appalachian folk with industrial rhythms, creating a sound fans describe as "haunted Sade" and"apocalypse pop." With four albums and numerous singles, including her latest, Undone by You, her music delves into themes of betrayal, revenge, and obsession.Beyond music, Fox is also a writer and the author of The Art of Transmutation, a poetry collection available in English and Haitian Kreyòl.Listen-https://realclothes.bandcamp.com/Fury Young is an artland rocker and surrealist rapper who grew up in downtown NYC in the 1990s. For years he has worked in music championing voices of other artists with FREER Records (formerly Die Jim Crow) - the first label in America for musicians in prison and formerly incarcerated. All the while, Fury was working on songs of his own that he never had time to finish or release. That changed in October 2023 with the debut of "X Ray," Fury's first song on streaming. Fury will be releasing a full length album this summer.Listen -https://open.spotify.com/intl-es/artist/4VXTDaM4TCu8VRy8B6eCEOTickets

raw_data.title: Quickies: Singles Event
raw_data.description: Welcome to the hottest NYC-based singles event! Hotties everywhere are calling this event "better than hinge".Quickies is a loosely structured speed dating/singles mixer aimed to help the lonely, sexy, slutty folks of NYC find someone for the rest of their lives (or at least one night).Quickies is queer friendly. Feel free to write your preferences on your name-tag so others can know what to expect when chatting with you.We are partnering with Friends and Lovers's JAZZ NIGHT to create an intimate evening that can continue past the length of the speed dating event. Live Jazz will be played in the front bar until late. This is the perfect opportunity to get to know your strongest connection a little bit more.DETAILS:Wednesday, April 2nd at 7PM. Doors open at 7. Speed dating starts at 7:30 PM promptly.21+ (It's at a bar...)PLEASE SIGN UP WITH YOUR LEGAL NAME AND HAVE AN ID TO SHOW AT THE DOOR.Mid-20s to Late 30sCapacity will be limited to 75 participants so make sure you and your hot friends RSVP.FYI:Please be respectful, communicative, and consensual. All a*sh*les will be removed for the safety and wellbeing of the participants.Refunds will not be issued on the day of the event.DISCLAIMER: By attending this event, you agree to being photographed for marketing materials. If you object, please let me know and we will try our best to not to post any photos or videos taken of you.TICKETS

raw_data.title: Back Outdoors: Hundred in the Hand and Deer Lady
raw_data.description: Join us Thursday April 10th for a live performance by Hundred in The Hand as they return to Brooklyn with support from Deer Lady.Hundred in The Hand is a band Based in the Dakotas fronted by vocalist, artist and activist Tokata Iron Eyes. A musical exercise in radical healing, and curious rage, serving as a sonic bridge between the stagnancy of traumas and the tenets of hope for a revolutionary future. The band is ever evolving and growing, co-creating with interchanging and intersecting artists across disciplines and the world.TICKETS

raw_data.title: Nightlife United Community Happy Hour + Dance Party: Hosted by Venus Cuffs
raw_data.description: Nightlife United is celebrating 5 years of industry impact withVenus Cuffs! A trailblazer in nightlife and cultural organizing, Venus Cuffs has created space and visibility for QTBIPOC communities, carving out room for joy, resistance, and radical celebration. Join us this Friday for a very specialCommunity Happy Hour fundraiser—a night of connection, music, and purpose.Nightlife United is an industry resource and advocacy non-profit coalition established by and for the Nightlife community. The organization is raising funds for theNU Workforce Development programthat upskills future Nightlife leaders from under-recognized communities.You’ll be in the room with some of NYC’s most respected nightlife veterans—an amazing opportunity to network, ask questions, and soak up wisdom from the folks who’ve built and sustained this city's cultural backbone.Expect:Incredible musicA room full of colleagues, creatives, supporters—and YOUThe chance to support the future of nightlife while celebrating its legacyDJ set by a special guest DJ (if you FnL then you know it'll be good!)Come early, stay late, and celebrate five years of impact with us.RSVP

raw_data.title: Bored of Dating Apps (Singles Only Dance Party)
raw_data.description: It’s been two years of so much love, friendship, laughs, snogs, countless numbers exchanges, keys exchanged, friends' holidays planned and incredible connections have been formed. Whether it’s a romantic relationship or a pal for life, we’re so happy with what’s been happening atBODA.Our socials have been described as wholesome, great for single peoples' mental health and events which are so good they make you wanna stay single, so come for great vibes & lovely people.We're hosting this social at theultimate singles' party,Friends and Lovers,where guests can connect at the bar over cocktails or over on the dancefloor...About the venue:Friends and Lovers is a project of passion, friendship, and love. Our mission is to provide a safe space for all kinds of people to let loose, be themselves, dance, make friends, fall in love, and party their hearts out, and a stage for creatives of all types to push envelopes and pull heart strings.What to expect:- A room where everyone is single. That's one of the only rules we have - you must be single to enter in. This is our singles club. A space free of couples, families, kids etc, a place just for us to let our hair down and be with like-minded people.- A 'Dutch Courage' shot (totally optional, so don't worry if this isn't your thing) along with a BODA mindful icebreaker- Our community-feel events attract a room full of brilliant people who appreciate slower, healthier, kinder approach to dating over the fast & furious modern dating climate singles are up againstEssential need-to-know bits:- EVERYONE IS WELCOME, whatever your sexuality or gender - as long as you're over 21-We cannot control the level of ratios on the night (men to women, women to women, men to men etc), so please do bear this in mind when booking a ticket.We do however try very hard to get a great, wide mix of ages, genders and sexualities, as we want everyone to have a fantastic night- Feel free to ask us any questions through this or follow us on Instagram to get a feel for our socials :@boredofdatingapps*Because of the nature of this event, there are no refunds or transfers. Ticket holders can only sell ticket on if the person shares the same gender on the ticket*- By purchasing a ticket means you consent to BODA taking videos and pictures of the event to post on our social media pages.Our hosts can't wait to meet you! See you there for good times.TICKETS

cleaned_events.title: Feel the News w Marcela Onyango
cleaned_events.description: Feel the Newsis a variety comedy show that also tells you how to feel about the news. After wowing zoomers all over on TikTok by giving them news with a sense of humour and anarchy, hostMarcela Onyangodecided to bring their strong feelings about the news IRL. During this very fun comedy variety hour, Marcela will humorously tell you how to feel about the news from an anarchist perspective while very funny comedians keep you laughing. In addition to very funny comedians, every month's show raises funds for direct action projects like mutual aid for people seeking asylum. So come laugh and support your community. You will leave the show more radical and more empowered, I promise.July’s lineup includesAlexandria LoveAtheer YacoubWinterLaura MerliWill PurpuraChristina BrownALL SALES FINALTickets

cleaned_events.title: Boyz in the Woods Comedy
cleaned_events.description: A comedy show hosted by Tawanda Gona, Joshua Stokes, Kenice Mobley, and Kofi Thomas, Boyz in the Woods comedy brings you the best stand-up comics you’ve seen on HBO, SNL, Netflix, and more.Think you’re an expert on the latest pop culture news?Audience members at Boyz in the Woods can win free drinks at our shows by answering pop culture and hip-hop trivia questions in between comedian’s sets.July’s lineup TBAHostsTawanda GonaKenice MobleyJosh StokesKofi ThomasJoin us at Friends and Lovers, for great vibes and seasonal cocktails, along with world famous DJs to keep you moving and grooving after the show. Perfect for meetups, after work, birthdays, and big groups. Come laugh with us!And don't forget to follow us on Instagram@Boyzinthewoodsnyfor updates on more drink deals and special drop-in guests.All Sales FinalTICKETS

cleaned_events.title: Boogie Blind Presents: Easily feat. Sticky Dojah
cleaned_events.description: Slide through Friday night , July 11th, and get right with top tier party starter and Uptown representative,DJ Boogie Blind, alongside special guestSticky Dojahfor “Easily”, a club night connecting nostalgic and new eras of the sounds that shaped the Big Apple whether it's Hip-Hop, Dancehall, Soul, or R&B.Pull up to Friends and Lovers and cut up for a night to remember at “Easily” with special guests alongside resident Boogie Blind from 10PM to 4AM every second Friday of the month.$10 general admission*$5 before 11PM w/ proof of RSVP*= No RequestsAll Sales FinalRSVPPhil Lembke, akaSticky Dojah, originally from Germany, is a DJ based in New York City. With over two decades of record-digging and Hip Hop as his foundation, his sets seamlessly blend a wide range of styles—from Soul, House, and Disco to Grooves and sounds from around the globe.His online mix videos have garnered millions of views on social media, inspiring vinyl enthusiasts from beginners to seasoned industry veterans. Known for his expertise with 7-inch vinyl, Sticky Dojah is one of the curators of “Touch of Classics,” a weekly all-vinyl event at the Darling Rooftop, and co-hosts the radio showRecords Before Renton Brooklyn’s iconic Lot Radio. Whether spinning all-vinyl sets or electronic club music, he delivers timeless classics while unearthing rare and unknown gems to energize any party with his funky, eclectic selections.Before moving to the U.S., Sticky Dojah played extensively across Europe and toured in Russia and Africa. He has shared stages with and performed for renowned artists such as Nils Frahm, Sergio Mendes, Q-Tip, Redman & Method Man, Nightmares on Wax, A Guy Called Gerald, Schoolly D, and more.A Red Bull Music Academy alumnus, Sticky Dojah has collaborated with global brands and institutions, including Google, Adidas, Universal, MoMA, the Goethe-Institut, Coca-Cola, Soho House, Institut Français, Edit 1, Nivea, and Diesel, among others.DJ Boogie Blind, is one of the most trusted and respected DJs in the industry today. As a Harlem representative, World Champion, and member of the pioneering X-Ecutioners DJ crew Boogie Blind has consistently served up NY’s true sound internationally for over two decades. Whether he’s rocking crowds for Coachella, NBA All Star Weekend, Montreux Jazz Fest, or the Espy Awards, Blind is always pushing the envelope in the booth with timeless Hip-hop, Funk, Dancehall, Disco, and House of yesterday and today.

cleaned_events.title: Discount Philosophy (Live Comedy)
cleaned_events.description: Part thought-provoking, part foolish: Discount Philosophy gathers some of the brightest minds in comedy to discuss life's most pressing ideas—one joke at a time.What is the meaning of life? Are we alone in the universe? What's for dinner? Join host,Spencer Simpson, and a variety of talented comedians as they interrogate questions that have plagued humanity for ages. A comedy show where great humor is matched with great inquiry: Discount Philosophy asks you to come for the laughs but stay for the confusion. Or the drinks.Saturday’s lineup includesShaunak GodkhindiGeorge HaywardWhitney RobinsonTICKETS

cleaned_events.title: Annie Hildebrand and Friends (Live Comedy)
cleaned_events.description: Watch local standout comedians do their best set at the pleasure of oneAnnie Hildebrand, comedy czar of the evening. After each set, she'll give a thumbs up or thumbs down, gladiator style, to determine if that comedian is allowed to continue their comedy career, or if they must quit forever. In the middle of the show, these stakes are then passed over to the audience where those who choose to participate are thrown into the pop culture gauntlet, competing in a round of trivia. Winners get prizes and losers must quit trivia for the rest of their lives.June’s lineup includesBrittany CarneyAnna BiancoPatrick HastieDan TreadwayArielle DundasHosted By:Annie HildebrandTICKETS

cleaned_events.title: Awkward Sex...And The City
cleaned_events.description: Awkward Sex is exactly what it sounds like: comedians reliving intimate tales about their sex life and breaking barriers about sex and dating.Hosted by Natalie Wall, the show pairs sexual inclusion with humor and sheds light on the awkward universal experience we all know and love.Awkward Sex is about taking taboo subjects and creating a safe space for people to feel seen and heard.From cocaine infused one night stands to IBS flare ups during cunnilingus, you and your friends will be hanging on to every word and excited to go out and have a sexual misadventure of your own.“Good sex is always good sex, but it takes a special person to turn bad sex into something amazing. And that’s where our New York comedian and podcaster Natalie Wall comes in.” -Philadelphia Gay News“The voyeur within will delight.” – Refinery29TICKETS

cleaned_events.title: Love Language: A Singles Dance Party for Women Who Love Women
cleaned_events.description: Love Language: A Singles Dance Party for Women Who Love WomenJune 18th | 8PM–11PM📍 Friends and Lovers — 641 Classon Ave, Brooklyn🎧 With DJsPero Whatever$5 | RSVP Required✨Proceeds benefit the Immigrant Defense Project (IDP)Looking to meet someone who speaks your love language? Join us atLove Language— a dance party for ladies who love ladies, made especially for singles who want to vibe, flirt, and maybe find their next crush (or summer fling 👀).We'll have the music to move you, the room to make moves, and the community to hold you. Whether you're dancing solo or syncing steps with someone new, this night is for you.Spots are limited, so grab your ticket and RSVP now. Let’s make some sparks — and support immigrant rights while we’re at it. ❤️‍🔥RSVP

cleaned_events.title: NQOMA
cleaned_events.description: NQOMA is a party series by Umumaroon that celebrates the African & diasporic drum cultures moving dance music worldwide. From amapiano to batida, baile funk to GQOM, afrobeats to jersey club and more, NQOMA is guaranteed to shake the dancefloor and move bodies featuring some the city's finest selectas.

cleaned_events.title: Ricardo Grilli Trio
cleaned_events.description: Experience an unforgettable evening at Friends and Lovers in Brooklyn as the Ricardo Grilli Trio brings their electrifying fusion of modern jazz, rock, funk, and Brazilian rhythms to the stage. Led by guitarist Ricardo Grilli, a rising star in the jazz scene who has graced iconic venues such as Smalls Jazz Club, The Blue Note, and the 55 Bar, the trio delivers a dynamic performance that blends virtuosic improvisation with infectious grooves. Drawing inspiration from luminaries like John Scofield and Eric Krasno, Grilli's compositions and arrangements showcase his unique voice as a composer and guitarist. With a rich musical background that includes performances with artists like Chris Potter, Aaron Parks, and Joe Martin, this is a night of music you won't want to miss.TICKETS

cleaned_events.title: Ben Pagano + Nico Fox + Fury Young (Live)
cleaned_events.description: Join us at Friends and Lovers for an eclectic evening of soulful and ethereal music featuring local NYC songwritersBen Pagano,Nico Fox, andFury Young.Ben Pagano is a local singer-songwriter, pianist and actor. His music is a blend of jazz, pop, soul, funk and psychedelia whilst maintaining a cohesiveness that defines the sound. His work is critically acclaimed and has been covered in publications such as New Yorker Magazine, Deli Magazine, Impose, Tiny Mixtapes to name some. He is currently working on his fourth album which will be released later this year.listen -benpagano.bandcamp.comBrooklyn-based artist Nico Fox, known professionally as Real Clothes, blends melancholy Appalachian folk with industrial rhythms, creating a sound fans describe as "haunted Sade" and"apocalypse pop." With four albums and numerous singles, including her latest, Undone by You, her music delves into themes of betrayal, revenge, and obsession.Beyond music, Fox is also a writer and the author of The Art of Transmutation, a poetry collection available in English and Haitian Kreyòl.Listen-https://realclothes.bandcamp.com/Fury Young is an artland rocker and surrealist rapper who grew up in downtown NYC in the 1990s. For years he has worked in music championing voices of other artists with FREER Records (formerly Die Jim Crow) - the first label in America for musicians in prison and formerly incarcerated. All the while, Fury was working on songs of his own that he never had time to finish or release. That changed in October 2023 with the debut of "X Ray," Fury's first song on streaming. Fury will be releasing a full length album this summer.Listen -https://open.spotify.com/intl-es/artist/4VXTDaM4TCu8VRy8B6eCEOTickets

cleaned_events.title: Quickies: Singles Event
cleaned_events.description: Welcome to the hottest NYC-based singles event! Hotties everywhere are calling this event "better than hinge".Quickies is a loosely structured speed dating/singles mixer aimed to help the lonely, sexy, slutty folks of NYC find someone for the rest of their lives (or at least one night).Quickies is queer friendly. Feel free to write your preferences on your name-tag so others can know what to expect when chatting with you.We are partnering with Friends and Lovers's JAZZ NIGHT to create an intimate evening that can continue past the length of the speed dating event. Live Jazz will be played in the front bar until late. This is the perfect opportunity to get to know your strongest connection a little bit more.DETAILS:Wednesday, April 2nd at 7PM. Doors open at 7. Speed dating starts at 7:30 PM promptly.21+ (It's at a bar...)PLEASE SIGN UP WITH YOUR LEGAL NAME AND HAVE AN ID TO SHOW AT THE DOOR.Mid-20s to Late 30sCapacity will be limited to 75 participants so make sure you and your hot friends RSVP.FYI:Please be respectful, communicative, and consensual. All a*sh*les will be removed for the safety and wellbeing of the participants.Refunds will not be issued on the day of the event.DISCLAIMER: By attending this event, you agree to being photographed for marketing materials. If you object, please let me know and we will try our best to not to post any photos or videos taken of you.TICKETS

cleaned_events.title: Boogie Blind Presents: Easily
cleaned_events.description: Light things up Friday night , June 6th, on BK’s most trusted dance floor with top tier party starter and Uptown legend,DJ Boogie Blind, alongside special guestsfor “Easily”, a club night connecting nostalgic and new eras of the sounds that shaped the Big Apple whether it's Hip-Hop, Dancehall, Soul, or R&B.Pull up to Friends and Lovers and cut up for a night to remember at “Easily” with special guests alongside resident Boogie Blind from 10PM to 4AM every second Friday of the month.$10 general admission*$5 before 11PM w/ proof of RSVP*= No RequestsAll Sales FinalRSVPDJ Boogie Blind, is one of the most trusted and respected DJs in the industry today. As a Harlem representative, World Champion, and member of the pioneering X-Ecutioners DJ crew Boogie Blind has consistently served up NY’s true sound internationally for over two decades. Whether he’s rocking crowds for Coachella, NBA All Star Weekend, Montreux Jazz Fest, or the Espy Awards, Blind is always pushing the envelope in the booth with timeless Hip-hop, Funk, Dancehall, Disco, and House of yesterday and today.

cleaned_events.title: Casa Mantequilla (Live)
cleaned_events.description: Get ready to dance with Casa Mantequilla, a high-energy and cross-cultural New York band featuring musicians from America, Puerto Rico, Nigeria, Belgium, and Congo. We mix West African, Latin, and American beats, singing in multiple languages for an unforgettable concert experience. Don’t miss the rhythm, the energy, and the vibe!ALL SALES FINALTICKETS

cleaned_events.title: DJ Malachi (Happy Hour)

cleaned_events.title: Back Outdoors: Hundred in the Hand and Deer Lady
cleaned_events.description: Join us Thursday April 10th for a live performance by Hundred in The Hand as they return to Brooklyn with support from Deer Lady.Hundred in The Hand is a band Based in the Dakotas fronted by vocalist, artist and activist Tokata Iron Eyes. A musical exercise in radical healing, and curious rage, serving as a sonic bridge between the stagnancy of traumas and the tenets of hope for a revolutionary future. The band is ever evolving and growing, co-creating with interchanging and intersecting artists across disciplines and the world.TICKETS

cleaned_events.title: Nightlife United Community Happy Hour + Dance Party: Hosted by Venus Cuffs
cleaned_events.description: Nightlife United is celebrating 5 years of industry impact withVenus Cuffs! A trailblazer in nightlife and cultural organizing, Venus Cuffs has created space and visibility for QTBIPOC communities, carving out room for joy, resistance, and radical celebration. Join us this Friday for a very specialCommunity Happy Hour fundraiser—a night of connection, music, and purpose.Nightlife United is an industry resource and advocacy non-profit coalition established by and for the Nightlife community. The organization is raising funds for theNU Workforce Development programthat upskills future Nightlife leaders from under-recognized communities.You’ll be in the room with some of NYC’s most respected nightlife veterans—an amazing opportunity to network, ask questions, and soak up wisdom from the folks who’ve built and sustained this city's cultural backbone.Expect:Incredible musicA room full of colleagues, creatives, supporters—and YOUThe chance to support the future of nightlife while celebrating its legacyDJ set by a special guest DJ (if you FnL then you know it'll be good!)Come early, stay late, and celebrate five years of impact with us.RSVP

cleaned_events.title: Bored of Dating Apps (Singles Only Dance Party)
cleaned_events.description: It’s been two years of so much love, friendship, laughs, snogs, countless numbers exchanges, keys exchanged, friends' holidays planned and incredible connections have been formed. Whether it’s a romantic relationship or a pal for life, we’re so happy with what’s been happening atBODA.Our socials have been described as wholesome, great for single peoples' mental health and events which are so good they make you wanna stay single, so come for great vibes & lovely people.We're hosting this social at theultimate singles' party,Friends and Lovers,where guests can connect at the bar over cocktails or over on the dancefloor...About the venue:Friends and Lovers is a project of passion, friendship, and love. Our mission is to provide a safe space for all kinds of people to let loose, be themselves, dance, make friends, fall in love, and party their hearts out, and a stage for creatives of all types to push envelopes and pull heart strings.What to expect:- A room where everyone is single. That's one of the only rules we have - you must be single to enter in. This is our singles club. A space free of couples, families, kids etc, a place just for us to let our hair down and be with like-minded people.- A 'Dutch Courage' shot (totally optional, so don't worry if this isn't your thing) along with a BODA mindful icebreaker- Our community-feel events attract a room full of brilliant people who appreciate slower, healthier, kinder approach to dating over the fast & furious modern dating climate singles are up againstEssential need-to-know bits:- EVERYONE IS WELCOME, whatever your sexuality or gender - as long as you're over 21-We cannot control the level of ratios on the night (men to women, women to women, men to men etc), so please do bear this in mind when booking a ticket.We do however try very hard to get a great, wide mix of ages, genders and sexualities, as we want everyone to have a fantastic night- Feel free to ask us any questions through this or follow us on Instagram to get a feel for our socials :@boredofdatingapps*Because of the nature of this event, there are no refunds or transfers. Ticket holders can only sell ticket on if the person shares the same gender on the ticket*- By purchasing a ticket means you consent to BODA taking videos and pictures of the event to post on our social media pages.Our hosts can't wait to meet you! See you there for good times.TICKETS
